name: Sandbox City - A toy car for children
name_original: Sandbox City - A toy car for children
description:
"Sandbox city" is a toy designed to encourage the creativity and imagination of the little ones.

"Sandbox city" has been created to be a toy in which adult supervision is not necessary.

"Sandbox city" contains different models of cars with which to perform different professions in the city.

Search for points of interest in the city.
Play as an ambulance.
Play as a taxi.
Play as a mechanic.
